sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Exxon Mobil Corp. ( XOM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.3%.
Year to date, Exxon Mobil Corp. has lost about 0.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.0%.
Home Depot is lower by about 10.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Boeing ( BA ), trading down 1.6%, and Chevron ( CVX ), trading up 1.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
